snippet.title: BatMan Arkham Knight [Batman Inc] Skin Gameplay
snippet.description:
In this video I am showcasing the [Batman Arkham Knight Batman Inc Skin]
This skin is CURRENTLY an exclusive to the [batman arkham knight hardcover volume 1]  If you would like to buy the book that includes the skin you can click the link.  http://www.amazon.com/Batman-Arkham-Knight-Vol-1/dp/1401258042/ref=sr_1_16?ie=UTF8&qid=1442700225&sr=8-16&keywords=batman+arkham+knight  MAKE SURE TO PURCHASE THE BOOK NEW!!!!!!!!!!! AND NOT ON KINDLE!!!!!!!!!!!! And it will include a [XBOX ONE and PS4 code] On the Last page of the book!

Vlog channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkUgadHBoL134R41nXJoEFg

Instagram https://www.instagram.com/witchdr2020/

Twitter https://twitter.com/WitcheryDr
